message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm looking for.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
